name: Ship Showdown
description:
This is a local multiplayer game in which you and your friend (or also you or someone else) both control a ship armed with cannons. Beware though, a damaging fog closes in on you in less than a minute!

  • Cannonballs replenish over time.
  • Your on the opposite side to the enemy will not shoot. Why would they?...
  • A damaging fog closes in on you!
  • Ramming or close fights can result in a draw!
